name: Dulce Sloan
bio: Dulcé is truly a unique emerging voice in the world of comedy. She offers a fresh and honest perspective that is extremely rare to find. A favorite among audiences, she was voted runner-up in the 2015 Atlanta’s Laughing Skull Comedy Festival. Most recently, she was featured on “Riggles Pick” for the FOX NFL Sunday Pre-game show and ABC’s Resurrection. Her signature sass and confidence drives her hilarious views on everything from her personal relationships to the absurdities of society.
